doc.field: Records of the Office of the President, Linda G. Mills
Records of the Office of the President, Linda G. Mills

The Office of the President is the top administrative office and is responsible for the management of the entire University structure. The duties of the President included the development, implementation, and monitoring of University activities, the cultivation of outreach programs, and the promotion of University activities to prospective donors and to the general public. Linda G. Mills was named the 17th president of New York University in February 2023, and officially took up her duties as NYU's president on July 1, 2023. This collection consists of materials created and collected by her office during his administration.

Linda G. Mills was named the 17th president of New York University in February 2023, and officially took up her duties as NYU's president on July 1, 2023. This collection consists of materials created and collected by her office during his administration.
New York University. Office of the President
New York University. Office of the President
New York University. Office of the President

The collection contains websites related to Linda G. Mills' designation as next NYU president, her inauguration as NYU President in October 2023, and actions and announcements as president of the university.

The Office of the President is the top administrative office and is responsible for the management of the entire University structure. The duties of the President included the development, implementation, and monitoring of University activities, the cultivation of outreach programs, and the promotion of University activities to prospective donors and to the general public. Linda G. Mills was named the 16th president of New York University in February 2023, and officially took up her duties as NYU's president on July 1, 2023.

https://www.nyu.edu/about/leadership-university-administration/president-designate/nyu-s-17th-president.html, https://www.nyu.edu/about/leadership-university-administration/president-designate/about-linda-g-mills.html, https://www.nyu.edu/about/leadership-university-administration/president-designate/publications-and-films.html, and https://www.nyu.edu/about/leadership-university-administration/president-designate.html were selected by Janet Bunde and captured through the use of Archive-It. Archive-It uses web crawling technology to capture websites at a scheduled time and displays only an archived copy, from the resulting WARC file, of the website. The accession number associated with these websites are 2023.011. In May 2023, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ve78NXU1RlU was added. The accession number associated with this website is 2023.025. In June 2023, https://www.nyu.edu/about/leadership-university-administration.html and https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D27LgJhhcu0 were added. The accession number associated with these websites is 2023.033. In July 2023, https://www.nyu.edu/about/leadership-university-administration/office-of-the-president.html and https://www.nyu.edu/about/leadership-university-administration/office-of-the-president/comms.html were added. The accession number associated with these websites is 2023.041. In October 2023, https://www.nyu.edu/life/inauguration-week.html was added. The accession number associated with this website is 2023.051. In February 2024, https://www.nyu.edu/about/leadership-university-administration/office-of-the-president/presidential-internship-program.html and https://www.nyu.edu/about/leadership-university-administration/office-of-the-president/strategic-pathways.html were added to the web archives. The accession number associated with these websites is 2024.012.

Archived websites are made accessible for purposes of education and research. NYU Libraries have given attribution to rights holders when possible; however, due to the nature of archival collections, we are not always able to identify this information.
If you hold the rights to materials in our archived websites that are unattributed, please let us know so that we may maintain accurate information about these materials.

If you are a rights holder and are concerned that you have found material on this website for which you have not granted permission (or is not covered by a copyright exception under US copyright laws), you may request the removal of the material from our site by submitting a notice, with the elements described below, to the repository email.

Please include the following in your notice: Identification of the material that you believe to be infringing and information sufficient to permit us to locate the material; your contact information, such as an address, telephone number, and email address; a statement that you are the owner, or authorized to act on behalf of the owner, of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed and that you have a good-faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law; a statement that the information in the notification is accurate and made under penalty of perjury; and your physical or electronic signature. Upon receiving a notice that includes the details listed above, we will remove the allegedly infringing material from public view while we assess the issues identified in your notice.
